short_description: A 19th-century neo-renaissance masterpiece built for Baron James de Rothschild, set within a 135-hectare English park just 25 km from Paris, offering prestigious wedding receptions for 20 to 450 guests with bespoke high-end catering by MOF-titled chefs.
